56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Sa`id:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying, "Indeed, anyone who fasts for one day for Allah's Pleasure, Allah will keep his face away from the (Hell) fire for (a distance covered by a journey of) seventy years

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الصَّوْمِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The superiority of observing Saum in Allah's Cause
